abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32687228, pmid32692854, pmid32692877, pmid32515253, pmid32692365, pmid32687223, pmid32531777, pmid32599571, pmid32470515, pmid32691604, pmid32691828, pmid32689877
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.24
